turn.2: Arrondissement of Brive-la-Gaillarde The arrondissement of Brive-la-Gaillarde is an arrondissement of France in the Corrèze departement in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.

turn.10: At the January 2017 reorganisation of the arrondissements of Corrèze, it gained two communes from the arrondissement of Tulle, and it lost three communes to the arrondissement of Tulle.
turn.12: As a result of the reorganisation of the cantons of France which came into effect in 2015, the borders of the cantons are no longer related to the borders of the arrondissements.
